name: Tales From Space: Mutant Blobs Attack
overview: A classic adventure from the creators of Guacamelee! Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack is a sci-fi puzzle-platformer of cataclysmic proportions! You’re an ill-tempered blob that grows in size by swallowing everything in its path. Evolve from a tiny captive into a world-eating giant. Gain freakish abilities like magnetism, telekinesis, and rocket boosting. Use your mutant blob powers to devour the pathetic humans and all of civilization! Key features include: -24 levels featuring a wide range of retro, 50’s-inspired environments. -5 'Tilt-a-Blob' bonus levels featuring gyroscopic controls. -Mind-boggling growth! Absorb everything you touch and grow to massive proportions. -Jump, slam, roll, and rocket through the air! Push and pull your weight against metal! Move objects with telekinesis! -Touch controls: use touch to manipulate the environment in handheld mode! -Normal controls: for people who hate touch controls! -In-game achievements. Can you become the platinum blob!? Pathetic humans beware!
